hanzi-su-wiki:
歳

Значения

Возраст

Мнемоника

  • Нога 止 в прямом и перевернутом виде и алебарда 戊 в значении «необратимость времени, невозможность повторения проделанных шагов». Иероглиф служит также для обозначения Юпитера, по которому определялось время.

  • "Хватит 止 задавать вопросы о моём возрасте!"

Варианты

歲, 岁
purpleculture_pinyin:
suì
Japanese variant of 岁
Японский вариант лет
rtega_mnemonic:
歳歳RS
X		year, years old
  • annual stop 止 after finishing a small 小 part of a fortress 戌 built by farmers when they are not busy on the fields; 放
 齢 才 年

歲歲RS
岁岁		歳year, age, harvest
  • annual stop 止 after finishing a small 𣥂/小 part of a fortress 戌 built by farmers when they are not busy on the fields
  • ⓢ the new year according to the lunisolar 夕 calendar when the celestial objects are in the same position to the mountain 山 as last year
heisig_constituent: year end, stop, footprint, one, little, small, march
heisig_story: Stop . . . march . . . little. Be sure not to forget that final dot in the element for march.
myStory: немного 小 осталось до конца года собаки 戌, 戍  (protection)
koohiiStory1: Santa had to put his foot down to stop a march of little guys, namely elves. They were protesting the harsh treatment they get every year-end when Santa asks them to step up toy production for the holiday season.
koohiiStory2: At the year-end, everything seems to come to a stop. However, there´s still enough time for a little march to celebrate.
jp_example_words:
歳(さい): -years-old
万歳(ばんざい): strolling comic dancer
二十歳(はたち): 20 years old, 20th year
jp_readingExamples: 歳末 (さいまつ), 歳月 (さいげつ), 二十歳 (はたち)
WaniKani_Radicals: 止, 丿, 戈, 示
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You need to stop a drunkard from going down a slide with a jackhammer to ask him how many years old he is. He's doing a lot of dangerous things right now, and they all have age limits.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Depending how many years old he is, this guy could be violating like three different laws right now.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: When you ask him how many years old he is, he turns to you and screams, "I'M A MILLION YEARS OLD AND YOU'LL NEVER STOP ME!" That's obviously not how old this kid is, so you take out your holy blue saber (せい) and slice the slide in half. Then the jackhammer. Then the kid's metal arm—wait! This kid is a cyborg (さい)!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Your saber cuts through the cyborgs robo-body and it screams, "OKAY OKAY I'M NOT A MILLION I'M ONLY FIVE YEARS OLD AND A CYBORG PLEASE DON'T REPROGRAM ME!"
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 穢 (けがす、アイ скверна). Сравни: 齢 (よわい、とし、レイ возраст).
Ru_Radicals: ノ, 小 (маленький), 戈 (копьё), 止 (останавливать)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you stop (止) the small (小) dog (戌) when you're X years old

suì
яп. вм. 岁

歳

Значения

Возраст

Мнемоника

  • Нога 止 в прямом и перевернутом виде и алебарда 戊 в значении «необратимость времени, невозможность повторения проделанных шагов». Иероглиф служит также для обозначения Юпитера, по которому определялось время.

  • "Хватит 止 задавать вопросы о моём возрасте!"

Варианты

歲, 岁

Radicals: 止, 丿, 戈, 示  (stop, slide, drunkard, jackhammer)
Meaning Mnemonic
You need to stop a drunkard from going down a slide with a jackhammer to ask him how many years old he is. He's doing a lot of dangerous things right now, and they all have age limits.
Depending how many years old he is, this guy could be violating like three different laws right now.
Reading Mnemonic
When you ask him how many years old he is, he turns to you and screams, "I'M A MILLION YEARS OLD AND YOU'LL NEVER STOP ME!" That's obviously not how old this kid is, so you take out your holy blue saber (せい) and slice the slide in half. Then the jackhammer. Then the kid's metal arm—wait! This kid is a cyborg (さい)!
Your saber cuts through the cyborgs robo-body and it screams, "OKAY OKAY I'M NOT A MILLION I'M ONLY FIVE YEARS OLD AND A CYBORG PLEASE DON'T REPROGRAM ME!"

Examples: 歳末 (さいまつ), 歳月 (さいげつ), 二十歳 (はたち)
ノ, 小 (маленький), 戈 (копьё), 止 (останавливать)
Не путать: 穢 (けがす、アイ скверна). Сравни: 齢 (よわい、とし、レイ возраст).
